attributes.action: Remove the Monarchy as the Head of State
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Monarchy should be removed as the Head of State and stripped of all power and made subject to the laws of the United Kingdom and thus makeing Parliament a Parliament for the People by the People, to make Government the United Kingdom Government and not Her Majesty's Government.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
